title: 820-00239 - 5.17V 0.07A after coke spill in charge port
message:
According to customer, a tiny bit of coke was spilled into a charge port. I can't find any corrosion on the board or on the ports themselves.

title: 820-00239 - 5.17V 0.07A after coke spill in charge port
message:
SMC requires 3V3_G3H amd SMC_REST_L (at least).
Post basic voltages for U7000; TBA_AUX_DET, TBA_VDDA/P, PPVIN_G3H_P3V3G3H, PM_EN_P3V3_G3H.

title: 820-00239 - 5.17V 0.07A after coke spill in charge port
820-00239 - 5.17V 0.07A after coke spill in charge port
message:
So you have a problem on U6903 area; post its voltages.
Don't forget to check diode mode at C6906/12.

title: 820-00239 - 5.17V 0.07A after coke spill in charge port
message: PP3V3_G3H_REG_R is shorted to GND. No more time, will follow up on this tomorrow. Thanks for the guidance!

title: 820-00239 - 5.17V 0.07A after coke spill in charge port
message: Board is fixed - CB300 was shorted to ground.
